group_1.narration: As we sought a way back to our original world,@we found ourselves lost in Kamihama City.@We wound up meeting a girl named Emily Kisaki,@and we really hit it off!
If we're going to properly run an investigation@in Kamihama, it's absolutely critical that@we broaden our network of contacts!
And so together with Emily, we began the@"Emily and Chisatochi Problem Counseling Room!"@We went straight to work solving Ayaka@and Shizuku's problems.
Then right after that, we got a phone call about@someone being chased by ruffians with guns…@Talk about a serious emergency!

group_1.textRight: Erm… You said this was an emergency…but…
I-I must kill myseeeeelf!

group_1.textLeft: There's no need for that!@We all messed up here!

group_1.textRight: I've caused so much trouble for everyone…@Aah… I must atone!

group_1.textLeft: That's exactly why you're NOT killing yourself!@Don't waste your life!

group_1.textRight: Ugh… This is all my fault to begin with…

group_1.textLeft: What's the situation?
Oh… Erm… Who might you two be?

group_1.textRight: Chisatochi and Takki are helping me out@with the counseling room!
As I know it, they're the girls who came from@another world and are staying over at Mikazuki.

group_1.textLeft: Eh? Oh, wow…@So that wasn't a joke, then…

group_1.textRight: Nice to meetcha!@So what's up with that girl?

group_1.textLeft: …Sorry, Emiri. Can you help put Asuka in line?
Asuka misunderstood the situation and@it led to this, as per usual.

group_1.textRight: Okay!
Asukyan!@Basta! Piantala! Arrêtes!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101301:effect_shake]Urgh…

group_1.textRight: B-but this was all my fault, really.@I'm the one who caused all this confusion…
The gun thing was actually from a game@I was playing. Erm, basically…

group_1.textLeft: I can explain.
First, regarding Asuka's misunderstanding…

group_1.narration: "It looks like we just missed you guys as@you left. While we were alone, Asuka and I@were chatting in the counseling room,@when out of nowhere…"

group_1.textLeft: [chara:300401:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Hm?!

group_1.textRight: Guns… Guns…@If this keeps up…I'm gonna die…!

group_1.textLeft: Guns…
Is she being chased by ruffians wielding guns?!
The moment Asuka heard that, she went@straight to calling Emily…
I went to sort things out, and it turns out Aimi@was talking about a VR game with gun-fighting.

group_1.textRight: Ahh… So Asuka jumped the gun, so to speak.
Urgh… I must kill—

group_1.textLeft: You will NOT!

group_1.textRight: So…what exactly is this about? Was she playing@a fighting game or something?

group_1.textLeft: …I'll take over from here.

group_1.narration: "I heard there was a new competitive VR@shooter game available at the nearby arcade,@so I went with my friends Masara and@Kokoro on our way home after school…"

group_1.textLeft: *Sigh* I couldn't confess today either…

group_1.textRight: You know your feelings are mutual thanks@to your wish, though.
As the outcome is certain, you ought to confess.
Wouldn't it be preferable to start dating sooner@rather than later?

group_1.textLeft: That's…true… Ugh…@I'm such a coward…
…Nngh…@If it all comes to this…
Hah! I've got it!@[chara:302301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302301:cheek_0][chara:302301:face_mtn_ex_020.exp3.json][chara:302301:lipSynch_1]If I lose this game, I'll confess to him!
I won't be able to run away then!@[chara:302301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302301:cheek_0][chara:302301:face_mtn_ex_010.exp3.json][chara:302301:lipSynch_1]...Just kidding.

group_1.textRight: Alright. If that's what you desire,@I'll put everything into winning.

group_1.textLeft: Eh?! Ah, that was a—!

group_1.textRight: That's not something you can joke about,@you know.

group_1.textLeft: Y-you have a point!@A girl never goes back on her word… Never!

group_1.textRight: …Right, if this will get you to make up@your mind, I'll help!

group_1.textLeft: Ah…erm…th-thanks…

group_1.textRight: This game is meant to be two against two,@though… How should we do this?

group_1.textLeft: Erm…
Friends! I'll round up some friends to join in!
…And that's how we got here.

group_1.textRight: It's incredible that Magical Girls can determine if@someone's in love with them with just a wish…

group_1.textLeft: But I've failed to confess to him so many times@by now, so like…I'm just desperate now.
Things really escalated when I blurted out that@I'd confess if I lost the game.
I was only kidding, though…@I wasn't being serious about it at all.
But they absolutely were.@It felt like they were both in cahoots…

group_1.textRight: You should have been clear that you were@only joking.

group_1.textLeft: Y-yeah… You're right…but…
